>Construction of pLYC6
acquire oligo olyc5				
acquire oligo olyc2
acquire oligo olyc2r
acquire oligo olyc5r
acquire plasmid pJBAG
acquire plasmid pAC-LYC
PCR olyc5,olyc2r on pAC-LYC	(1200 bp, pcrA6)
PCR olyc2,olyc5r on pJBAG	(1172 bp, pcrB6)
Assemble pcrA6,pcrB6	(Gibson, pLYC6)
Transform pLYC6	(Mach1, Amp)
